post.body: yeah everything skyrockets when we get a democratic president... back in the day of President Clinton, the taxes are high so we can spend money on government programs so the people who are working for the government gets some money. I'm not saying you're wrong..but the gas never was a huge problem unTIL a republican so as-BUSH-was in office..we have seemed to be in debt because also too much spending on the war...so actually it looks as though the opposite happened..

You might not be saying it, but I will. Fool is wrong! Supply side economics means suppliers make a bundle...you get screwed. "Trickle-down economics" is a lie. The only thing that trickles down is inflation. Putting more money in the hands of the rich leads them to increase their investments, bringing prices out of the reach of the lower and middle classes. Not just for gas, but also for things like housing and health care.
